data.name: Pablo Polanco
data.Profile: I am a 30-year-old industrial engineer with a critical and analytical mind, I spent several years carrying out a personal project where I applied administration and management concepts that I acquired in my degree. It is thanks to this experience that I developed a high capacity to work under pressure and a quick adaptation to new scenarios. Today I am experiencing a change in my professional life towards the IT field by training myself in web development and I lookiing forward for new challenge where i can be a professional and personal contribution to to work groups. and so continuing to expand my knowledge in this area

experience.jobDescription: Development environment simulation for backend project for a NGO. In which I worked with Java language and the Spring framework with Spring Boot and Spring Security modules developing components in the different layers of the application. The team was organized with the tool Jira, with a Scrum ceremony per week in which the ticket are asigned to be carried out. For version control i used Git and GitHub. to generate useful documentation i used Swagger.
Personal project of pastry for celebrations. where I developed client management tasks, production process management and financial management.

Design of an operational improvement plan for the electrode cutting line, Implementation of VSM (value stream mapping), as a diagnostic tool for the production line. Construction of FMEA matrix to identify specific faults. According to the information collected in the analysis, a Factorial design of experiments was used to determine the most pertinent solution to the faults found.
Preparation of a database with the most relevant events of the most critical plants of the refinery within the period 2014 - 2015.
